overview: Teen Bindu (Points of Life), is an amalgamation of three separate short films, which share the correlative concept of Art and Artists. They are ‘Canvas’, portraying a struggling artist’s life which takes an unforeseen turn when he accidentally comes across a high profile murder case, starring Saurav Das, directed by Soumyajit Adak. ‘Lakshmi’, renders a penurious life of an old man, who is a sculptor and his very young wife and their longing to have a child
title: Teen Bindu
